lead_paragraph: Officials say Burundi's environment minister has been shot dead, in a country where political turmoil over president Pierre Nkurunziza's extended term has led to political killings.
snippet: Officials say Burundi's environment minister has been shot dead, in a country where political turmoil over president Pierre Nkurunziza's extended term has led to political killings....

headline.main: Lone Gunman Kills Burundi's Environment Minister
headline.print_headline: Lone Gunman Kills Burundi's Environment Minister
